thread.title: Alibaba Offers to Buy Chinese Video-Streaming Service Youku Tudou
thread.title_full: Alibaba Offers to Buy Chinese Video-Streaming Service Youku Tudou - WSJ

author: Carlos Tejada
title: Alibaba Offers to Buy Chinese Video-Streaming Service Youku Tudou
text:
BEIJING—Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. said it offered to acquire all the shares of Chinese video-streaming service Youku Tudou Inc. it doesn’t already own, in a major bet on offering services outside its core e-commerce platforms.
The Chinese company said on Friday that it would offer $26.60 per Youku Tudou American depositary receipt for the...
